== Summary ==

The <nowiki>[[GNUPhileo| GNU Phileo]]</nowiki> allows to create a database which contains detailed the philatelic information on stamps, envelopes, maximum cards etc. The philatelic material can be sorted on set of criteria. It is possible to create tags for fast search and grouping.

While one plug-in is planned, but in the future occurrence new is possible. This plug-in allows to make exhibition albums and to keep them in format PDF.
